newsitem.title: QATAR: Qatar bluechips inch ahead in lacklustre trade.
newsitem.headline: Qatar bluechips inch ahead in lacklustre trade.

text.p: Bluechips inched ahead in lacklustre trade on Qatar's unofficial stock market in the week to Thursday, brokers said.
The Commercial Bank of Qatar's 18-share index edged up to 128.64 points from 128.27 the previous week.
Market leaders Qatar National Bank and Qatar Navigation advanced three riyals each to 535 and 685 respectively. Qatar Insurance gained two riyals to 547.
Qatar Cinema chalked up two riyals to 207 and Qatar Leisure and Tourism won one riyal to close at 45.
Trade in three shares was suspended ahead of their annual general meetings and 10 shares were unchanged.
